content: HIS-N Internally threaded sleeve High-performance internally threaded insert for HVU2 adhesive capsule and injectable adhesive hybrid/epoxy anchors (carbon steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti HIT elements range Designed for use in solid concrete in combination with the relevant Hilti HIT injectable adhesive anchoring systems Optimized design Features a chisel tip to cut and mix the Hilti HVU2 adhesive capsule (to be installed using the HIS-S setting tool) Flush installation Applications Fastenings in concrete and masonry in combination with the relevant Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortar Internally threaded fastenings in concrete in combination with various Hilti injectable adhesive mortars, HVU2 capsules and 8.8 grade steel anchor rods ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated PROFIS Software: Yes Cleaning procedures: Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | PROFIS Software | Yes | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 258021 - Int thrd inserts HIS-N 1/2 x 5 - Package Size 5 pc - 258023 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-N 3/4x*8 1/8* - Package Size 5 pc - 258020 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-N 3/8x4 3/8 - Package Size 10 pc - 258022 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-N 5/8x6 3/4 - Package Size 5 pc
